description.narrative: EU and the member states will support the establishment of an integrated police unit in the capital of Kinshasa in DR Congo. The EU Commission supports the establishment og a training center and equipment, while the member states provides gear to the police unit. Thus, this project only concerns contributions to the police unit. Parts of the equipment provision concerns weapons deliveries. Denmark has stated before the Commission that contributions from Denmark only are to be utilized in accordance with DAC rules. This Danish demand is written in the project protocol. The Danish part of the project is expected utilized on protection equipment and police uniforms to the police unit. The project is a foreunner project for an EU Police Mission in DR Congo.
